documents.document: @npertick thanks you. Safe travels to you.

@gerry_hall sorry can't help on this one.
@2manycameras beauty pic Fred.
@gerry_hall ah. I have no idea on this one. Didn't follow it. Sorry.
@gerry_hall sorry. Which diversion?
@dbachz1 @AntonovCompany @FlySWISS sigh. Thanks. I hate deleting tweets but I'm sure Antonio won't mind. Lol.
VIDEO @AntonovCompany Antonov An124 arriving Iqaluit from Zurich with engine for broken @FlySwiss Boeing 777 that d… https://t.co/yYMUg9ZgSD
@kkraemerk nice video. Thanks. Looks cold there.
@DomRush @BadNewsJays @apoure25 but when you have engine failure how does it matter if it's the closest, most suitable, airport at the time?
@BadNewsJays cool. Thanks for this. Interesting indeed.
@notl419 @usairforce @AirForceReserve @RCAF_ARC neat. Not sure if they did. Although they look more like C130s. Did they have props?
@mijocrescent @BadNewsJays haha good for them :)
@mijocrescent @BadNewsJays aww. :) The haven't seen FrozenPlane yet? I can send some pics. Lol
@BadNewsJays exactly. Like effort given.
@BadNewsJays @HuffPostCanada a plane similar, yet completely different, to this one....
Aircraft returned to Calgary after smoke reported in cockpit #WS662 https://t.co/o94LW2MxgM
Air Canada turns private jet into flying ski chalet for $300,000 travel package https://t.co/mr1s3Hn9og
@dumanoir doh. That must be it ;)
@StephanieLukas @WestJet no worries. They also have a large fleet. You'll see it more just for that.
@StephanieLukas actually not really. Don't see many @Westjet with issues. These happen. It's part of flying.
@JLaliberte6 glad you're good and safe on the ground. Hope you get to Toronto soon.
@JLaliberte6 yikes. Hope you're okay. Did you see the smoke?
.@WestJet #WS662 inspected at gate by emergency services.#Calgary to #Toronto flight declared emergency for 'smoke… https://t.co/sDRjSlTd8Q

@SubwayOperator apparently lowered incorrectly onto jacks while undergoing maintenance.There were rumours it was written off;obviously false
Update @AirCanada's 'damaged' Airbus A330 (C-GFAH, Fin 932) heading home. #AC7165 QPG-HND #AC7164 HND-YYZ. ETA in T… https://t.co/x4NibvH6x6
@williamvavrek ladders are frowned on at yyz.
@williamvavrek @Aviation_Pics sadly no. It wasn't that spectacular. It just put you above the fence.
@williamvavrek @Aviation_Pics wonder if that hill was made for spotters. We used to have that, Fedex hill, but it's gone now.
@dumanoir indeed. Not sure why they flew like that.
Update Cubana #CU161 to Camaguey returning to Montreal w/cabin door open indication. Burned fuel, now inbound YUL. https://t.co/xfuQ85RlGY
Update @Westjet #WS1402 to Phoenix has landed back in Calgary. Reported smoke. Emergency services inspecting https://t.co/r9kdviKF0r
@Mxhdroom @flightradar24 @AirportWebcams yes. Aware of that. It's operating for Cubana. Has been for a long time.
@Niagara_411 yes. Me too!
.@WestJet #WS1402 #FrozenPlane Calgary to Phoenix burning fuel before returning to Calgary with reported smoke. Lea… https://t.co/7ZpXIrBinf
@AlexRobinsonTV thanks. Just getting caught up on all these.
DIVERSION Cubana #CU161 to Camaguey, Cuba, returning to Montreal. Holding for 30 minutes, burning fuel, prior to la… https://t.co/OMLQspxflb
@MrBradJones @Airbus lol. Yes. Airbus to the rescue.
@deboersap sorry. Just seein this. Perhaps a routine change for weather? Looks like it's on its way fine.
@kkraemerk @IamLeroySanchez @FlySWISS Ha. Certainly not LA. Guess he wasn't into snow golf ;)
@rronge or people need to fly less. Haha.
@rronge sometimes yes. Lots of factors in play. It's not always a matter of 'who's fault'. Just the way it goes.
@janlam01 me neither. Hehe.
@rronge no. It's often not previous landers fault. It happens. People want more flights so planes fly closer. Sometimes this happens.
@janlam01 I think he said crew after triple 7. I see #LX7003 A330 skeded back to JFK. Wonder if it it's a crew swap flight.
@janlam01 yep. Likely more options to get those pax to Zurich from JFK. Sounds like a good solution. Or hotels near JFK. Not much at YFB
@Niagara_411 can't land jets at the island. It's busy there too. Missed approaches are common, it's not a 'who's fault is it' kind of thing
@Niagara_411 or maybe it'a the traveling public's fault. Demand for more flights means planes fly closer. Sometimes you need to go around.
Missed approach. Previous landed C-FJDS Cessna 550 still on the runway. #AC102 https://t.co/yevPcGiN5G
@mvormittag @flightradar24 @IqaluitAirport @YFBSpotters good question. That's why ATC asked pilot 'what's at YFB?'
Update Swiss #LX7002 rescue flight just departed NY JFK heading to #Iqaluit. Pilot told tower 'we have to pickup st… https://t.co/Qjkn2BtSKj

@kkraemerk @FlySWISS @IqaluitAirport haha. Thought the same. They have ~6,700 residents.
@kkraemerk @FlySWISS @IqaluitAirport I bet. They're not used to 200+ pax arrival.
@jpthejudge they can definitely handle large aircraft. But not sure they have accommodations for them tho.

@mijocrescent @tattuinee ohhh, me too.

.@AmericanAir #AA1804 Charlotte to Indianapolis diverted to Knoxville. Reported security incident. Police on scene.… https://t.co/gev2JMhPXg
@janlam01 it's been snowing for last hour or so. Plows are out. So delaying things a little.
@seanroofus nice. never get tired of these.
@rronge I know, right? 79 hawks would be plenty ;)

It's a bird... it's a plane... it's a plane full of birds.
Saudi prince bought tickets for all his 80 hawks… https://t.co/7Xhv4GBFgQ
@NewsHoff awww. Something not right about that. Hope you enjoy last couple days.
@NewsHoff I do like it. And not just for the planes. :) BTW...sorry you're missing all the cold here.

@AKaknevicius thank you Andy.
@Drparsons44 nice. Lufthansa still has their 747 flying here. So a couple options.
@ryanwarrington8 seemed like they were trying to squeeze them in. This time it didn't work, they got too close so around they went.
@Vikingteapot lol. Seems a little odd even when you know it's a whale.
@Drparsons44 @KLM @TorontoPearson @KLMCanada I agree. One of the few that still fly these beautiful birds.
@betbrockfitness @KLM @TorontoPearson @KLMCanada thanks Beth. A very comfortable ride. Love flying on a @KLM 747
TAKE TWO @WestJet #WS398 Kelowna to Edmonton missed approach, too high, pilot decided to go around. https://t.co/2e8UhJGx9u
@brianyyz that's very nice. White balance is weird there. I think it's 1900K. I did a custom white I liked so I stick with it.
@brianyyz it's been here quite regularly lately. So should be back soon.
@Toronto_PR_Guy indeed that the plan. Begins in June.
